message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $130.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $120 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle at $125?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can only go up to $123. Can you meet me at that price?
